title: OpenAI Resume Reviewer
author: Multi-LLM Personal Assistant
onboarding: Provide your input, and the system will respond.

commands.name: Review Resume
commands.description: Review a resume for a given candidate.

commands.name: Check Skills
commands.description: Check technical skills based on provided keywords.

commands.name: Check Projects
commands.description: Check relevant projects based on provided project names.

commands.name: Check Experience
commands.description: Check professional experience based on provided job titles.

Professional Experience.Command: /check_experience Coding Dojo, Head of Business Analytics

typical_workflows: For Skills and Projects, use '/check_skills' and '/check_projects'.

use_cases.case: Reviewing resume for Data Scientist role
Checking technical skills for NLP projects
